entry.RedBlue: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry.Yellow: Appears to be more active at night. It loves round and shiny things. It can't stop from picking them up.
entry.Gold: It is fascinated by round objects. It can't stop playing with them until it tires and falls asleep.
entry.Silver: It loves anything that shines. It especially adores coins that it picks up and secretly hoards.
entry.Crystal: It loves things that sparkle. When it sees a shiny object, the gold coin on its head shines too.
entry.RubySapphire: MEOWTH withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this POKéMON loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
entry.FireRed: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.
entry.LeafGreen: Adores round objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry.Emerald: MEOWTH withdraw their sharp claws into their paws to silently sneak about. For some reason, this POKéMON loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
entry.DiamondPearlPlatinum: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry.HeartGold: It is fascinated by round objects. It can’t stop playing with them until it tires and falls asleep.
entry.SoulSilver: It loves anything that shines. It especially adores coins that it picks up and secretly hoards.
entry.BlackWhiteBlack 2White 2: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry.X: It is nocturnal in nature. If it spots something shiny, its eyes glitter brightly.
entry.Y: Adores round objects. It wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.
entry.Omega RubyAlpha Sapphire: Meowth withdraws its sharp claws into its paws to slinkily sneak about without making any incriminating footsteps. For some reason, this Pokémon loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
entry.Sun: It lies around all day, becoming active near dusk. At night, it wanders the city in search of loose change.
entry.Moon: It loves shiny things. It often fights with Murkrow over prey they’re both trying to catch.

FireRedLeafGreen: Route 5, 6, 7, 8, Bond Bridge, Canyon Entrance, Cape Brink, Five Isle Meadow, Kindle Road, Ruin Valley, Seavault Canyon, Treasure Beach, Water Path
